ygData.subject: RE: Switching items
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I know it has been done to death at some point or another but here goes.  What you have so far is correct, but the inventory slots will not work as hot
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I know it has been done to death at some point or another but here
goes. What you have so far is correct, but the inventory slots will not
work as hot keys unfortunately. In order to switch items you will have to
physically move the items.

For instance my setup has inv3, inv4, melee1, melee2, inv5 and inv6. Let
us say I am using my shield and longsword and would like to switch to a
drum in inv5. This is the process you have to go through.

1. Pick up sword drop into slot inv5 which picks up the drum
2. drop the drum into melee2 and it will be exchanged with the shield.
3. Drop the shield into inv6.

DOne. As you may notice the whole process is totally manual
unfortunately.

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Ben Wilson wrote:

> From: Ben Wilson <bwilson@...>
>
> Hi,
> I have tried to figure out how to do this, and I'm at a terrible loss. I
> made hot keys for my melee slots, 1 and 2, and I made a hot key for an
> inventory slot. When I try any of these hot keys, nothing happens. It would
> make my life SO much easier if I could figure out how to do this. If someone
> wouldn't mind stepping through the process exactly how it should be done, I
> would be eternally grateful. This is my first bard, and I'm having a blast,
> made lv10 this weekend!
>
> Thanks,
> Leaflay
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: claudio gante [SMTP:gante@...]
> > Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 10:49 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Switching items
> >
> > From: "claudio gante" <gante@...>
> >
> > You can assign inventory slots to HotKeys,
> > Just like any other assign, press a slot with your left mouse
> > button
> > for 2 seconds then drop it in the hot key, do the same with your primary
> > and secondary weapon slots and u will have a fast way to swap them.
> > []'s Kel
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Matthew Horne <mjhorne@...>
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> > Date: Segunda-feira, 23 de Agosto de 1999 09:12
> > Subject: [eqbards] Switching items
> >
> >
> > >From: "Matthew Horne" <mjhorne@...>
> > >
> > >G'day.. im a newbie bard on the solusek ro server and i have a question
> > to
> > >ask.
> > >Is there any way to quickly swap items.. say a drum and a sword? thanks
> > for
> > >your help...
> > >
> > >lumaiea
